jld.title: Start the New Year With New Marketing Solutions
description: As a Justia Connect Pro member, you earn a $200 Justia Credit on your membership anniversary each year! If you havenâ€™t used your credit yet, we suggest exploring our eligible Justia Marketing Solutions to start 2024 off with a fresh digital marketing strategy. As a bonus, purchasing new marketing solutions from Justia before December 31 may even give you an extra business deduction on your 2023 tax bill!
